title.rendered: “IDF Executes Targeted Strike on Hezbollah Sites in Lebanon: Full Report on Terrorist Infrastructure Demolition”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF has completed an attack in Lebanese territory.

A short time ago, the Air Force combat aircraft completed a focused attack on terrorist targets in the territory of Lebanon. As part of the attack, several terror infrastructures were destroyed, alongside military sites of the Hezbollah terrorist organization.

In addition, in recent hours a number of launches were identified that passed from Lebanese territory towards various areas in the northern country and fell in open areas. IDF forces attacked the sources of fire and additional areas in Lebanon.

Furthermore, three hostile drones were identified crossing from Lebanon and fell in the Mount Dov area, the incident ended.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/48QpA1t
